[[File:Beren Full Score Cover.jpg|thumb|Artwork from the full score by permission of Ted Nasmith.]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2019, the complete Full Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[Beren and Lúthien, Op. 47 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 422 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete orchestral score with introduction by the composer, synopsis and translations of the Elvish.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2019 “Lúthien"
